snippet: Detective Ian Cyrus was suspended after a video appeared to show him taking almost $3,000 from a Brooklyn deli as officers swept the store to curb the sale of loose cigarettes.
abstract: New York Police Detective Ian Cyrus is suspended after surveillance video appears to show him taking money from Brooklyn deli during sweep for illegal cigarette sales.
lead_paragraph: Detective Ian Cyrus was suspended after a video appeared to show him taking almost $3,000 from a Brooklyn deli as officers swept the store to curb the sale of loose cigarettes.

headline.main: New York Detective Is Suspended Amid Inquiry on Theft at Deli
headline.print_headline: Police Detective Is Suspended Amid Inquiry on Theft at Deli
